title: Is Riot Ever Going To Bring Back Urf?
body: when is riot gonna bring back urf?

replies.body: Yes they are. Possibly next april fools but they've already confirmed it will come back at some pt.
oh ok ty, one last thing will it be a perma gamemode?
He's crying about the noob game mode and not the manatee.
im not crying dude, why you gotta be so rude, it is a simple question and I would like to know when urf would be back.
Unlikely. All riot has said is that they've approved it to come back in the future. No time estimate just that they want to make it even better this time.
oh ok, well im looking forward to it i've never played urf before but it looks like a lot of fun. :)
Who cares? Just get over it already. Holy damn.
